Richmond.West County Detention Center:
West County Detention Center is a large coeducational adult medium security Contra Costa County prison in Richmond, California opened in 1991. 


== Overview ==
It is located in the Point Pinole area of the city between Parchester Village to the south, Point Pinole Regional Shoreline to the west and the Hilltop area to the east. The prison can house up to 1,104 inmates.
